entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
